about_the_game:
A Christian Quest... Surviving the End Times

In a future where Machines control the world, few can escape the clutches of the evil one. Embark on a Rescue Mission on a small island in the North Sea to save as many souls as you can. Scour the deep depths of mysterious dungeons, explore labyrinthic caves, and clear lush terrains that have been overrun by the mechanisms of evil.

Gameplay

Christian Quest is a traditional, Birds-Eye-View, Action-Adventure game that features an open world, secret caves, dungeons, and epic boss fights. On your journey you will cross paths with fierce enemies (Machines controlled by the enemy), which you can defeat using your Sword, Shield, and other hidden tools found throughout the world. You will also come across some elusive puzzles.

Your Mission is to deactivate the Island's Defense Systems so that the remaining Christians can escape. This will be accomplished by completing the various Dungeons in the game to complete all the Objectives of the Main Mission.

Co-Op

Team up in Local Co-Op gameplay! Up to 3 players can journey together to find secrets, collect upgrades, and power up on their journey!

Each Player will take control of one of 3 Main Characters. The Main Characters all have a story to tell. It is told throughout the length of the game, no matter who you choose to play as, so you don't have to worry about replaying the game multiple times with different characters.
